sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM t_user_kyc
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT profile_pic, pan_card, aadhar_front, aadhar_back
FROM t_user_kyc
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

UPDATE t_user_kyc
SET profile_pic = :P1 /* {{Profile}} */, pan_card = :P2 /* {{Pan}} */, aadhar_front = :P3 /* {{AadharFront}} */, aadhar_back = :P4 /* {{AadharBack}} */, updated_by = :P5 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE user_id = :P7 /* {{identity}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET kyc_status = :P1 /* {{0}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */

INSERT INTO t_user_kyc
(user_id, profile_pic, pan_card, aadhar_front, aadhar_back, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{identity}} */, :P2 /* {{'/assets/images/profile/'+ProfileAdd.name}} */, :P3 /* {{'/assets/images/pan/'+PANAdd.name}} */, :P4 /* {{'/assets/images/aadhar/'+AADHARAdd.name}} */, :P5 /* {{'/assets/images/aadhar/'+AADHARBackAdd.name}} */, :P6 /* {{identity}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET kyc_status = :P1 /* {{0}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */
